room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: Went here with a group from work.  We were in the Gold Rush game.  It was so well thought out and the tasks were well connected to each other.  Great team building experience!  I would definitely recommend this and would definitely go back. It gives a whole new meaning to "get a clue!!"

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: So much fun! We did Gold Rush and I loved the attention to detail; it was truly an immersive experience. No two clues used the same logic, which kept us on our toes. The staff was friendly and helpful. Can't wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: Yay! We escaped!!!! We did the "Gold Rush" with Missy and it was a blast! The scenery and the amount of detail put into this game was awesome. This is a great family or team bonding activity. We will definitely be going back!

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: We did gold Rush and that was crazy fun!!! The puzzles were all over the place and the clues were just as intense. We got way into it but hey! We escaped!! Would do again ASAP.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: Dude best place ever!! Did gold rush today now on to conquer all the other rooms! The staff was amazing!
